title: Best of the Program | 10/1/19
description:
The Left is doing the EXACT same things it's accusing Trump of! Stephen Colbert’s audience chanted “lock him up,” and apparently only “wackos” still believe the “nonsense” that Joe Biden could have done something wrong. But look at the facts: Ukraine is the Democrats’ Russia. They are intentionally sowing the seeds of chaos and trying to pin the whole thing on Trump. But through it all, hold tight to Winston Churchill’s advice: “Keep calm and carry on.”
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
